Views¶

app.bookings.views.add_event_for_calendar(booking, bookingAction)[source]¶

This function will sent a calendar event to user who book the car

Parameters

  • booking – booking of the car

  • bookingAction – the booking action record of the car

app.bookings.views.book()[source]¶

This function allow user to book (POST) a car

When user book a car, a booking record and booking action is created

<json int car_id

id of a existing car

<json int duration

book duration (hours)

Status 200

book created

app.bookings.views.cancel()[source]¶

This function allow user to cancel (POST) a booking

a booking action record for cancel booking is created

<json int booking_id

id of a booking record

Status 200

book canceled

app.bookings.views.delete_event_calendar(event_id)[source]¶

this function delete event on the calendar

Parameters

event_id (str) – calender event id

app.bookings.views.return_()[source]¶

This function allow user to return (POST) a car

a booking action record is created

<json int booking_id

id of a booking record

Status 200

return succeed

app.bookings.views.unlock()[source]¶

This function allow user to unlock (POST) a car

a booking action record for unlock is created

<json int booking_id

id of a booking record

Status 200

car unlocked

REST API¶

app.bookings.api.add_event_for_calendar(booking, bookingAction)[source]¶

This function will sent a calendar event to user who book the car

Parameters

  • booking – booking of the car

  • bookingAction – the booking action record of the car

app.bookings.api.book()[source]¶
app.bookings.api.cancel()[source]¶

API for cancelling (POST) a booking

a booking action record is created

Parameters

booking_id (int) – id of a booking record

Status 200

book canceled

app.bookings.api.return_()[source]¶

API for user to return (POST) a car

a booking action record is created

Parameters

booking_id (int) – id of a booking record

Status 200

return succeed

app.bookings.api.unlock()[source]¶

API for unlocking (POST) a car

a booking action record is created

Parameters

booking_id (int) – id of a booking record

Status 200

book created
